plot: Fourteen little kids go over an unsolved football mystery, and they end up teaching an unexpected life lesson to grown-ups.
title: L'equip petit
plot_es: Fourteen little kids go over an unsolved football mystery, and they end up teaching an unexpected life lesson to grown-ups.
plot_en: Fourteen little kids go over an unsolved football mystery, and they end up teaching an unexpected life lesson to grown-ups.
